stories.text: It seems, based on submissions & comments I've read here over the past several months, that many of you are anticipating a major economic downturn in the near future. What steps are you all taking to prepare for such an event? How can one hedge against the risk of a stock market crash, housing crash, and inflation all at the same time?
stories.title: Ask HN: How are you preparing for a changing economic tide?

stories.text:
I have an idea for an I.O.T project to detect whether or not a door is bolted (not just closed), but I'm struggling to choose an appropriate sensor. Additionally, I'd like it to be wireless (and battery operated) so there wouldn't be any cable management to deal with.

I did a quick prototype with an inductive proximity sensor which didn't work well, and looked into reed sensors. Any recommendations?
stories.title: Ask HN: Sensor for detecting whether a door is bolted or not?

Out of a Housing Crisis, into Vans
